pr_title: Don't fireRead if handler body publisher is gone. Issue  #3651

timeline.message: Don't fireRead if handler body publisher is gone. Issue  #3651

timeline.bodyText: Is the ctx.name() equal to http-streams-codec? Since we have given the users ability to modify the pipeline based on the names of other handlers we shouldn't be changing their names.
timeline.author: jameskleeh

replies.bodyText: I don't believe I have changed the name. In my testing ctx.name() was always http-streams-codec so it seemed wasteful to have this additional string concatenation.
replies.author: graemerocher
